name: nextcloud.js
description: Javascript API to talk to Nextcloud

scripts.test: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d && sleep 30q && jest --config jest.conf.js --runInBand; docker-compose down -v
scripts.test-watch: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d && sleep 30 && jest --config jest.conf.js --runInBand --watch
